bioconda.name: idba
bioconda.summary: IDBA is a practical iterative De Bruijn Graph De Novo Assembler for sequence assembly in bioinformatics.

biocontainers.name: idba
biocontainers.summary: A short read assembler based on iterative de bruijn graph. it is developed under 64-bit linux, but should be suitable for all unix-like system.

biotools.summary: A short read assembler based on iterative De Bruijn graph. It is developed under 64-bit Linux, but should be suitable for all unix-like system.

bioschemas.name: IDBA
bioschemas.summary: A short read assembler based on iterative De Bruijn graph. It is developed under 64-bit Linux, but should be suitable for all unix-like system.

galaxy.summary: Wrappers for the idba assembler variants.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: A short read assembler based on iterative De Bruijn graph. It is developed under 64-bit Linux, but should be suitable for all unix-like system.
